<Text: The Ones:  The trio consists of three male vocalists Paul Alexander, JoJo Americo, and Nashom Wooden, who met while working at the Greenwich Village boutique Patricia Field.>

Text: The Ones:  Each of them has a background in performing, DJing, and being stylists within the underground New York club and fashion scenes.
